name: Pierre Maret
content: Pierre Maret's Home Page Pierre Maret Professor in Computer Science Connected Intelligence Hubert Curien Laboratory, UMR CNRS 5516 Université Jean Monnet  Université de Lyon France You can contact me for projects, open positions, or cooperation Contact Teaching activity Software engineering, Programming XML technologies, Semantic Web, Interoperability Information systems, Data bases, Business Process Modeling Research methodology Research Activity Semantic web, data and knowledge modeling, ontologies Virtual communities, social networks Publications, Events Five main publications - Dennis Diefenbach, Vanessa López, Kamal Deep Singh, Pierre Maret: Core techniques of question answering systems over knowledge bases: a survey. Projects, collaborations Marie Skłodowska-Curie Innovative Training Network (ITN, EU funds) WDAqua, Answering questions using web data (Executive Board member, Training Director). 2015-2018 Head of the French German doctoral college Semantic reasoning and coordination, 2014-2021 Industrial collaborations and PhD in collaboration with companies (Alcatel-Lucent Bell Labs, Graphinium, Stample, 1D lab, Winfrontier ) International academic cooperations: University of Tokyo, Aoyama Gakuin University, JST, University of Bonn, Fraunhofer, York University, University of Twente Curriculum Born on September, 18th 1966 Nationality: French Status: Married, 3 children Positions: 1992-1995: S2Com society (consulting company). 1996-1997: Assistant professor, University of Lyon (France) 1998-2007: Associate professor, Institut National de Sciences Appliquées, Lyon, France 2003-2004: invited researcher at the University of Karlsruhe, Germany (1 year) 2008-present: Professor, University of Lyon (University Jean Monnet, Saint Etienne, France) 2014: Invited professor at the University of Tokyo, Japan (2 months) 2017: Invited professor at the Aoyama Gakuin University, Japan (2 months) Contact Pierre Maret (pierre.maret at- univ-st-etienne.fr) Université Jean Monnet de Saint-Etienne Laboratoire Hubert Curien - UMR CNRS 5516 18 rue du Professeur Lauras - 42000 Saint-Etienne Cedex 2 - France Tel: +33 (0)4.77.91.58.11
